name: All Things Literature - Notion Workspace
description: A one-stop Literature Review Hub specifically for PhD scholars, university/college students, and anyone doing research to ensure a smoother literature review process.Reading critically is a skill that can be taught: All Things Literature is designed to support you in developing confidence in your literature review workflow whatever your field of study. Go beyond simply listing and summarizing what you read, critically analyze and synthesize using my templates. Includes 11+ minutes worth of video
features: Go beyond simply listing and summarizing what you read,critically analyze and synthesize using my templates.; Includes 11+ minutes worth of video content: guidance, best practices, and detailed instructions; Purchase once, yours forever: unlock lifetime access to the Literature Review Hub.; Become confident in critically evaluating literature:25+ prompts/questions across 3 critical review templatesto guide you in developing a critical analysis of the literature.
